title: High-tech farming helps automate the job — except when the equipment gets hacked
itunes:title: High-tech farming helps automate the job — except when the equipment gets hacked
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: Tractors, combines and other farm equipment have become computers on wheels. They are both bluetooth-enabled and connected to the internet which, as Dina Temple-Raston of the “Click Here” podcast explains, makes them incredibly vulnerable to hackers.
itunes:summary: Tractors, combines and other farm equipment have become computers on wheels. They are both bluetooth-enabled and connected to the internet which, as Dina Temple-Raston of the “Click Here” podcast explains, makes them incredibly vulnerable to hackers.
